content.raw:
If you run into problems with DART dependencies, you could try the following. It should not be necessary, but I had to add it in order build Gazebo with DART on my computer.
```
diff -r 42215f2019f5 deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt	Tue May 30 22:39:05 2017 +0000
+++ b/deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Jun 12 12:22:58 2017 -0700
@@ -21,6 +21,7 @@
 
 if (HAVE_DART)
   include_directories(${DART_INCLUDE_DIRS})
+  include_directories($<TARGET_PROPERTY:dart,INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>)
   link_directories(${DART_LIBRARY_DIRS})
 endif()
```
content.html:
If you run into problems with DART dependencies, you could try the following. It should not be necessary, but I had to add it in order build Gazebo with DART on my computer.

diff -r 42215f2019f5 deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt    Tue May 30 22:39:05 2017 +0000
+++ b/deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt    Mon Jun 12 12:22:58 2017 -0700
@@ -21,6 +21,7 @@

 if (HAVE_DART)
   include_directories(${DART_INCLUDE_DIRS})
+  include_directories($<TARGET_PROPERTY:dart,INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>)
   link_directories(${DART_LIBRARY_DIRS})
 endif()
